channel.title: [317][Delta]NPC Dialogue
channel.description:
Can u help me? I want to add NPC Dialogues, but when they are done talking it gets to the last case and it wont close.. it will just say please wait... at the bottom. How do i fix this so that the NPC Dialogue will close after he is done talking?
PICTURE: http://screensnapr.com/v/vfcQbg.png

item.title: [317][Delta]NPC Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

case ####; closeAll(); //closes last dialogue break;

Read full topic
